remove.description: add or remove the item fav

compilation.description: Number of Various Artists Type Compilation

artistCompilation.description: Number of Single Artists Type Compilation

password.description: Password of calling admin user is required to create an user. this is NOT the user password!
Password of calling user (or admin) is required to change the password
Password of calling user (or admin) is required to change the email
Password of calling user (or admin) is required to generate/update the Subsonic token

version.description: The version number of the waveform data format

channels.description: The number of waveform channels present

sample_rate.description: Sample rate of original audio file (Hz)

samples_per_pixel.description: Number of audio samples per waveform minimum/maximum pair

bits.description: Resolution of waveform data. May be either 8 or 16

length.description: Length of waveform data (number of minimum and maximum value pairs per channel)

items.description: Array of minimum and maximum waveform data points, interleaved. Depending on bits, each value may be in the range -128 to +127 or -32768 to +32727
